text: وَلَمَّا جَآءَ أَمۡرُنَا نَجَّيۡنَا شُعَيۡبٗا وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مَعَهُۥ بِرَحۡمَةٖ مِّنَّا وَأَخَذَتِ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ٱلصَّيۡحَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُواْ فِي دِيَٰرِهِمۡ جَٰثِمِينَ

translation.en: And when Our command came, We saved Shu'ayb and those who believed with him, by mercy from Us. And the shriek seized those who had wronged, and they became within their homes [corpses] fallen prone
translation.id: Maka ketika keputusan Kami datang, Kami selamatkan Syu'aib dan orang-orang yang beriman bersamanya dengan rahmat Kami. Sedang orang yang zalim dibinasakan oleh suara yang mengguntur, sehingga mereka mati bergelimpangan di rumahnya
